thread.title: JNTU vice-chancellor, two others killed as Innova collides with lorry near Anantapur in Andhra Prade- The New Indian Express
thread.title_full: JNTU vice-chancellor, two others killed as Innova collides with lorry near Anantapur in Andhra Prade- The New Indian Express

title: JNTU vice-chancellor, two others killed as Innova collides with lorry near Anantapur in Andhra Prade- The New Indian Express
text:
JNTU vice-chancellor, two others killed as Innova collides with lorry near Anantapur in Andhra Pradesh Published: 22nd February 2017 06:01 PM | Last Updated: 22nd February 2017 06:40 PM | A+ A A- | 0 Share Via Email JNTU Anantapur vice-chancellor MMM Sarkar and two others died in a road accident on the NH-44 near Gajarampalli of Pamidi mandal in Anantapur district on Wednesday. (EPS) ANANTAPUR: Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University (JNTU) Anantapur vice-chancellor MMM Sarcar and two others were killed in a road accident on Wednesday afternoon. 
The accident happened near Gajarampalle in Pamidi mandal, some 35 km from Anantapur town in Andhra Pradesh. Sarcar (57) along with his personal assistant Fakruddin was on his way to Anantapur in his Innova when the accident happened. 
The car ran head on into a speeding lorry coming in the opposite direction and the three men in the Innova, including the driver, died on the spot. 
Medical emergency teams rushed to the spot but it was too late. Related Article
